SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.interfaces.game

Interface GameStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultStrategy, DiceStrategy
public interface GameStrategy
The GameStrategy interface defines the contract for implementing game strategies. It provides methods for executing attack logic and managing ownership of conquered territories. This interface allows different strategies to be defined and implemented for handling game actions and outcomes.
Author:
Yesha Shah

  • Method Details

    • attack

      boolean attack(Player p_Player, Country p_From, Country p_To, int p_Armies)
      Executes the default attack logic between two countries.
      Parameters:
      p_Player - The player initiating the attack.
      p_From - The country from which the attack is initiated.
      p_To - The country being attacked.
      p_Armies - The number of armies involved in the attack.
      Returns:
      true if the attack is successful, false otherwise.

    • makeMeKing

      default void makeMeKing(Player p_Player, Country p_Country)
      Transfers ownership of conquered territories to the specified player.
      Parameters:
      p_Player - The player to whom ownership of the territory is transferred.
      p_Country - The country that has been conquered.
